name: Afforestation
description:
● App developed by myself ●

I like the app "Fog of World" very much.
So I developed the app "Afforestation".
You can plant trees on the load you pass by.
So this small land will belongs to you.

Reclaim with all persons on earth.
You need to fight for each inch of land.
Don't worry, 60 billion lands are here.
No land you can't get, Only land you can't reach.


● Thank you for downloading ●

If you want to give some advises or any good ideas,
you can send email to: hanchongzan@icloud.com
